Feature: Move Wall As a player who grabbed a wall, I wish to move the wall between possible rows and columns of the board so that I could move it to its designated target position. I wish to get feedback from the game if a designated wall position is illegal.
Scenario Outline: Move wall over the board ?[90m# src/test/resources/ca/mcgill/ecse223/quoridor/features/MoveWall.feature:11?[0m ?[36mGiven A wall move candidate exists with "<dir>" at position (<row>, <col>)?[0m ?[36mAnd The wall candidate is not at the "<side>" edge of the board?[0m ?[36mWhen I try to move the wall "<side>"?[0m ?[36mThen The wall shall be moved over the board to position (<nrow>, <ncol>)?[0m ?[36mAnd A wall move candidate shall exist with "<dir>" at position (<nrow>, <ncol>)?[0m
Examples:

Feature: Switch Current Player As a player, I wish to know when it is my turn to move. My clock shall be counting down then. Once my move is finished, my clock shall be stopped and it shall be my opponent's turn.
